s.text: To better help us assist you, write, fax or E-mail and tell us more about yourself.
We look forward to your written response, membership support, and having the opportunity to work with you.

Founded in 1985 by successful business owners and professionals with disabilities, and restructured in 1991 as a 501(c)(3) charitable, nonprofit membership organization, the dba provides business information and assistance to enterprising individuals with disabilities, worldwide.

Having served thousands, the .dba is recognized as one of the nation's largest and leading authorities on the self-employment of people with disabilities.
